name: Truck and Logistics Simulator
summary:
Truck & Logistics Simulator is a vehicle simulation game where you are tasked to perform logistics from beginning to end in single or multiplayer. You will initially take a mission with your vehicle(semi trucks, rigid trucks, pickups, vans), then load your vehicle using a forklift, crane, telescopic handler, wheel loader and other load vehicles available in logistics area. 
 
Multiplayer enables you to make convoys and make deliveries together with your friends. 
 
Attach a trailer to your vehicle (Car/Van/Pickup) to increase cargo capacity. Fill up your vehicles fuel tank from fuel stations and repair your vehicle in maintenance areas. For vehicle carrying truck missions, you must park vehicles on trailers yourself.
